           throws DataAccessException
        Clears all Event data
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - if the operation fails

      • add

        public void add​(Event event)
         throws DataAccessException
        Adds new Event data
        Parameters:
        event - the Event object to be saved
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - if the operation fails

      • delete

        public void delete​(Event event)
            throws DataAccessException
        Deletes the matching event if found, throws exception if not found
        Parameters:
        event - the event to be deleted
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - if operation fails, ie if the event is not found

      • getEventsByPersonID

        public java.util.List<Event> getEventsByPersonID​(java.lang.String personID)
        Returns a list of all Event objects related to the given personID
        Parameters:
        personID - the personID of the Person whose events are returned
        Returns:
        eventsList a list of all events related to the Person

      • getEventsByType

        public java.util.List<Event> getEventsByType​(java.lang.String eventType)
        Returns a list of all Event objects with the given eventType
        Parameters:
        eventType - the eventType of all Events to be returned
        Returns:
        eventsList a list of all Events of type {eventType}
